name: Fremde Brut
description:
A 7-Day-Roguelike (7DRL) made in 2017. You control a character in semi realtime, looting lockers for items and finally beating the boss enemy so that there is one menace less in the universe.

(Unfortunately the boss enemy did not make it into the game... but you can collect dogtags to win the game)

Changes V1.1

- Fixed non exploding rockets

- Added terminals for locating dead bodies

- Tweaked some values
